page.title: 26LOCAL BUSINESSES, BUCHLYVIE - updated 2011
page.content:
The only businesses surviving from the 1986 survey are the hairdresser and the garage.

New large and small businesses have opened. On the small business side there are at least two local plumbers, two painter and decorators, an electrician, a glass engraver and a cake decorator. Of a larger scale business, the Green Gallery, an Art and Craft outlet, and secondly a business producing Laser Cut products now operate in the village. The pottery shop previously mentioned produces ceramics that are sold locally and throughout Scotland and the UK.

There are three Bed and Breakfast establishments.


Arthur Benns
